entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Ottawa (Kanata - Orléans)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:23 PM EDT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 2.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Ottawa Macdonald-Cartier Int'l Airport 11:00 PM EDT Thursday 23 March 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: 2.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.1 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 74 %
Dewpoint: -2.1°C
Wind: WNW 16 km/h gust 28 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending early this evening then partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h late this evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High plus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Thursday 23 March 2023
